attributes.action: Government  to ensure internet access for all homes with children
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to do this to make sure our children do not miss out on learning. Some parents  priorities food and paying bills over the Internet and a child should not lose out on bettering their knowledge.
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide basic Internet access to homes with children while in this pandemic. As school is a mandatory thing, the government should provide or contribute to the Internet access needed to carryout remote learning.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558132

You may also wish to sign this petition:
